name: Wereshark
description: The Wereshark is a large humanoid with traits resembling both a shark and a human, capable of transforming between forms.
memorable: Its ability to shapeshift and Blood Frenzy ability make it a deadly predator.
goals: To hunt and exploit weakened prey.
relations: Likely found with other aquatic predators or lycanthropes.
environment: Aquatic environments, often near coastal areas.
strengths: Immunity to nonmagical physical attacks not made with silvered weapons.
attacks: Multiattack with three trident strikes or a powerful bite that can induce lycanthropy.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy grants it advantage on attacks against wounded foes.
senses: Blindsight 30 ft. in shark and hybrid form allows it to detect movement in water.
skills: Has a +4 perception bonus, enabling it to notice details effectively.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for 1 hour in hybrid form.
Shapechanger ability to transform into shark-humanoid hybrid or Large hunter shark.
Retains swimming speed in hybrid and shark forms.
Losing walking speed while in shark form.
Cursed with wereshark lycanthropy upon a successful bite attack.
test_queries: monster that can turn into a shark
ferocious predator with blood frenzy ability
